price: នៅថ្ងៃដែលយើងនឹងប្រមូលផ្ដុំបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលកោតខ្លាចទៅ កាន់ម្ចាស់មហាសប្បុរសជាភ្ញៀវកិត្ដិយស។
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
